entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
